title: The Author to Her Book - attitude of speaker

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Bradstreet uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex attitude of the speaker.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Bradstreet uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex attitude of the speaker.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
